title: Can't Unlock Radiant Wukong Icon
body: I recently purchased the Radiant Wukong Figure and every time I try to unlock the icon it says "UNLOCK ERROR An unknown problem has occurred. Please try again in a few minutes." I was wondering why I'm getting this problem and if a rioter could help me out. Thanks!

replies.body: It's possible the code could have been intended for another region, but we can take a closer look.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help out with this directly.  See you there!
